title: Climbing out of OCE ELO Hell - The Worst of Servers.
body:
Hi guys,

Currently doing a climb out of ELO Hell (Bronze 5, started at 0LP).

About Myself: I'm a silver player who got hacked down to bronze. After a month or two of anger, I decided to make the best of it and start a climb.

Highest previous rank: Silver 1, was in promos for Gold 5 and the season ended. Gutted.

Current Rank: Bronze II, 0 LP

Main Selections: Top - Garen, Riven, Irelia
                              Jungle - Xin,  Warwick,  Shyvana, Nunu
                              Mid - Lux
                              ADC - Vayne
                              Support - Sona

Getting here:

B5 to B4 was rough. Basically an afk every 3 games. I found tanking top was the easiest way out - Garen, the Bronze buster.
Got promoted from B4 straight to B2, and then got 2 afks in my first game, 1 in my second, and 1 in the 3rd. Straight back down to b3 without a sniff of a fair chance to do anything about it.
I won my way back to B2, and am currently battling along.
To give you an example of "bronze/ELO hell", I just went 22/7/9 on Jax w/ Devourer. The ONLY reason we lost was the Ashe in my team trolled, followed me around laughing, stole my stacks with last hits and refused to join team fights. Honestly, the reason was because he was playing like balls and I was carrying. This somehow upset him. Terrible, toxic player. Sometimes you get people like this, and you just have to roll with it. But holy balls its frustrating.

Some of my win streaks:

http://postimg.org/image/bie1d8so9/

http://postimg.org/image/w6uwbtfrt/

I'll just be posting as I go, letting you know how I'm going. Any advice would be great, feel free to check my match history and point out weaknesses :)

Cheers for any support,

Ròb

(On a side note, why don't we have a general discussion? Such a welfare selection).

This time picked galio, (first time using him). Spammed laughter, apparently looking forward to trolling me again.
so why don't you just dodge then?

>low priority que

That's leaves not dodging.

Dodging is a time penalty and LP only.
um. you lose 3 lp for 1 dodge and 6min wait.  -3lp and 6min wait is well worth not playing a game like that

Elo hell don't exist bruh, if you're bronze/silver then you are really bad and belong there. Don't tell me you get bad teams because people make new accounts and get plat instantly...if you are low elo then you belong there. No such thing as "elo hell" LMAO

and fyi silver/gold is pre trash also
i was gonna give you shit for saying you were hacked but your decent spelling and mentioning of playing support and/or any role in general has made me reconsider

People are playing tanks everywhere lel, had a game with cho mid, malphite top, volibear jg and thresh support.

We lost hard
Got the same support as last game, who was a boss. Sivir Blitz into Cait Zilean. Free mana all day from bombs and traps.

Worked hard, Galio went 0/5 in first 10 mins. Lucky I carried, had a good top Riven too.

He followed me around spamming laugh and bombing anything I tried to last hit >.>
Just play Split push Nasus until your Silver 3. thats what i did.

I climbed "out of bronze" earlier this season. I reached s2 and was being matched with low gold. Out of nowhere i had a 20 game losing streak and went all the way down to b3 in 1 week, about a month ago. I'm now b2. Feels.
